# HKBloodGlucoseMealTime.preprandial

**Case**

A blood glucose sample taken just before eating a meal.

## Declaration

```swift
case preprandial
```

## Relative Meal Times

- **HKBloodGlucoseMealTime.postprandial**: A blood glucose sample taken just after eating a meal.
